titleStmt.title: Dorcas: a true patterne of a goodly life, and good end With a pithy exhortation to the practice of faith and good works. In a sermon preached at Totnes in Deuon, Ianuary 14 16[...] at the funerall of Mrs. Mary Bab, widow. By Thomas Saltern, sometimes lecturer there; and preacher of the word at Bradford. And now published, at the request of sundry godly persons.
titleStmt.author: Saltern, Thomas, b. 1579 or 80.

titleStmt.title: Dorcas: a true patterne of a goodly life, and good end With a pithy exhortation to the practice of faith and good works. In a sermon preached at Totnes in Deuon, Ianuary 14 16[...] at the funerall of Mrs. Mary Bab, widow. By Thomas Saltern, sometimes lecturer there; and preacher of the word at Bradford. And now published, at the request of sundry godly persons.
titleStmt.author: Saltern, Thomas, b. 1579 or 80.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher] for Roger Iackson, and are to bee sold at his shop neere the Conduit in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: The Bodleian Library copy and the Yale University copy have imprint date altered in ink to read 1631; the Bodleian copy has date of sermon's delivery in title altered to 1630--STC.
Imperfect; date in title and imprint altered affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
